title: Start
body:
Do you want to master your combat?
[[ Indeed. |yes]] 

[[ I'm a pacifist, sorry. |no]]

title: yes
body:
Left Click to perform a melee attack.
[[ Go on. |yes2]]

[[ But I'm a mage... |yes2]]

title: no
body: Fine then, don't learn my magnificent techniques.

title: yes2
body:
Right Click to perform a dodge roll.
[[ That will be useful. |yes3]]

[[ What about shooting magic projectiles? |yes3]]

title: yes3
body: Come back to me once you've killed four enemies.
